meanings.definition: A nucleoside consisting of cytosine and ribose.
meanings.sent1: I learned about cytidine in my science class.
meanings.sent2: RNA contains cytidine as one of its components.
meanings.sent3: The cytidine molecule and the ribose were best friends in the nucleoside group.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of cytidine was as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to show us how cytidine is structured in a nucleoside.

meanings.sent1: Scientists study the role of cytidine in RNA.
meanings.sent2: RNA is made up of different components, including cytidine.
meanings.sent3: The cytidine molecule in RNA always had a smile on its face.
meanings.sent4: In the world of RNA, cytidine was the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: The importance of cytidine in RNA cannot be overstated.
